head.title: Delete {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to remove specific pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily process PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Delete pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} apps with powerful document processing features, including page removal in {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It offers features such as merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and removing pages to enhance your applications.

more_features.title: Advanced document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a comprehensive set of features, allowing you to work with over 50 popular business file formats efficiently.

feature_1.title: Merge files in different formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and archives with flexible merging options for precise results.

feature_2.title: Page management
feature_2.content: Rearrange document pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to organize content effectively.

feature_3.title: Modify page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between landscape and portrait orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages into separate files
feature_4.content: Select specific pages and save them as standalone documents.

formats.title: Delete pages from multiple document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, enabling fast and convenient document modifications.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore additional powerful features of our solution.

examples.comment_1: Create a {{NameProduct}} instance with the file path
examples.comment_2: Specify the page number to delete
